name: Margarita Farrell
body: The good news is that I like Ember products so much that I have bought 3 of them. The bad news is that the non-replaceable battery in the first two eventually failed, making an otherwise functional product useless for walk-around use.

name: Willa Ray
body: This mug is incredible. I use it every day. It is incredibly excessive - just the thought that we live in such luxury and wealth that this thing exists is insane - but here I am, enjoying my coffee at the same temp every morning.

name: Gloria Nguyen
body: Drinking coffee that is always the same temp is an interesting experience. I like the ceramic coating, the fact that the bottom and sides do not get hot on the outside, and the overall feel of the mug.

name: Elvia Le
body: The mug does keep our drinks hot (we ordered two of the large mugs) and the build quality is great, but in less than one month the paint is peeling / chipping from the rim of the mug.

name: Norton Page
body: Tl;dr - Software and user interface let this product down. For the price I paid I expected better. I would still recommend it, but with a inescapable sense of disappointment and a hole in my pocket.

name: Tammie Mays
body: I didn't want to hurry to write this review so now that 6 months have passed, this is what I've learned from every day use:
